# Template: Inline Text Examples

Used to show real-world usage of the grammar topic being explained. Place after an explanation or code block, never standalone.

## Exact Format

```mdx
**Ejemplos:**

- [Sentence with **key word(s) in bold**] (Spanish translation)
- [Sentence with **key word(s) in bold**] (Spanish translation)
- [Sentence with **key word(s) in bold**] (Spanish translation)
```

## Rules

- The heading "Ejemplos:" is always bold, followed by a colon
- Unordered list, no emojis of any kind
- Spanish translation always in parentheses at the end of each item
- Bold only the word(s) that illustrate the grammar point — not the entire sentence
- Between 3 and 5 examples per block
- Vary subjects and contexts across examples so they are not repetitive
- Examples must be complete, natural sentences — not fragments

## Real Example

```mdx
**Ejemplos:**

- She **works** at a hospital (Ella trabaja en un hospital)
- He **studies** English every day (Él estudia inglés todos los días)
- The store **opens** at 9 AM (La tienda abre a las 9 AM)
- My brother **plays** the guitar (Mi hermano toca la guitarra)
- It **rains** a lot in November (Llueve mucho en noviembre)
```
